attributes.action: Provide Proper Affordable Property for First Time Buyers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should bulid affordable houses for young first time buyers on modest incomes such as key workers (not the high earners). These properties should only be sold to first-time buyers and noone else to help us get on the property ladder.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
